oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cubic graphical regular representations of $PSL_2(q)$
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Xia, Binzhou
Fang, Teng
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Group Theory
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study cubic graphical regular representations of the finite simple groups $PSL_2(q)$. It is shown that such graphical regular representations exist if and only if $q\neq7$, and the generating set must consist of three involutions.
